segments.text: Excuse me , sir . But please call an ambulance . My friend suddenly got a sharp pain in the stomach .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is he all right ? There's a big hospital just around the corner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , is there ? Will you find someone to take us to the hospital then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , sir . I'll have someone to take you there . By the way , is he insured ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad to hear that . In case he's not insured , the hospital will never accepts any patient .
segments.speaker: S2
